name: The Experiment (itch) (Kjaerulff)
description:
Can you follow simple instructions?

Can you perform simple task within a limited deadline?

Can you press a button?

If the answer to the questions above is YES! Then sign up, and be a subject of The Experiment.

The Experiment is my first game and is mainly developed to test different things such as sounds, subtitles, save/load data, and exporting and uploading the game to Itch.io.
